title: PESSAT - April 20, Slot 1
content:
Since many were asking how was PESSAT, I'll put the details here

English - 10 MCQs Comprehension + 10 MCQs for Antonyms and Synonyms

Maths
 - Integration, Relations, Functions & Sets had more weightage than other chapters
 - it was moderate paper, 10-15 difficult questions, 20-25 Easy, 20-25 Intermediate Questions were asked - there were also Integer Type Questions (Around 10 i believe I don't remember that properly)

Physics
- Magnetism, NLM, Motions (1D, 2D, Rotational, Circular) and Modern Physics had more weightage than other chapters
 - My preparation for Physics was bad, so I can't comment on the difficulty - it also had 1-2 questions which wasn't there for PU Board namely Radioactivity

Chemistry
- I don't remember much about it (but I'll update asking my other friends who were also writing in the same slot

This is only based on April 20, Slot 1 - the weightage and difficulty may or may not vary for other dates and slots

comments.body: so only 2Q from deleted syllabus came right? and chem no p block s block?
Other shift is it diff or the same???Â
bhai attempted 93 no guess work today was my paper
english mei sirf antonym synonm i am fucked now i thought tense wgare ayega
So overall was the exam cbse lvl?
there was one question to identify adverb, one collective noun, rest antonyms (1/2) and synonyms, Excluding the 10 comprehension
I haven't seen any cbse papers so I can't say if it was cbse level
How exactly did you prep for pessat?
I had my jee and kcet prep, didn't do anything extra for pessat
Ahhh alr what's the rank you're expecting in kcet?
Damn bhai.. I attempted almost 155..yesterday was my paper.. Not sure kya hoga, zyada -ve na pad jae... Last yr i was getting 2-3k rank.. This tym lets see..
